content: **crest of a wave cowl** we have used the beautiful crest of a wave lace pattern from our crest of a wave shawl to create a stylish easy to knit easy to wear cowl in fingering weight yarn this pattern will be free forever as a little thank you for supporting us in our first full year of designing many thanks **pattern requirements ** **sizes ** one size however the size is easily adjustable by adding or removing multiples of 6 sts **yarn ** 100g of any 4ply/fingering weight yarn sample was knitted using schachenmayr regia premium merino silk in shade 0051 silber blau **needles ** 3 mm / us or size needed to get gauge 60 cm 24 inch circular needle **gauge ** 30 sts x 40 rnds in 10 cm 4 in in lace pattern
